modName: Armor Ebony MAIL Gold Female and Male
summary: This is the MAIL Version of the Ebonyarmor. With Gold Ornaments and HD Resolution. Lot of Handmade Work to the Golden Ornaments. Sharpen and Smoothing the Textures and many more little changes.
descriptionHtml:
This is the MAIL Version of the Ebonyarmor. With Gold Ornaments and HD Resolution. Lot of Handmade Work to the Golden Ornaments. Sharpen and Smoothing the Textures and many more little changes.

For Male and Female

Works perfekt with my other Mods for Ebony

Ebony Male Armor: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=549
Ebony Female Armor: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=493
Ebony Complete Weapon Set: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=573


INSTALL:
Copy the Folder \"textures\" to your \"Skyrim/data\" Folder.
author: LetoKolente
